name: Vector-Velocity-Variable
summary: The variance in vectoral velocity of a phase photon field
short_description:
"The two major spiritual structures, Particles and Fields, interact in a dance to create the physical universe.  The particles emit an Electric and Magnetic field (variously referred to as the EM field, E&B field, or Electromagnetic field) at every moment.  The particle is the originating entity from which all fields emanate, and the particle is the object of action upon which fields operate.  The Field informs the rest of the universe about the particleâ€™s position and velocity at the Moment of its emanation. " 


~Thomas Lee Abshier
